title: Dear Riot, Why Am I Stuck in Base???
body:
Dear Riot, I am stuck in base.
Perhaps you guys could fix this bug please.
Thank you
-XSirCution

And to any of you guys who are willing to support me by subscribing, I'd highly appreciate it :P

replies.body: Did you disconnect at the start and have to reconnect or something the way it made you walk back after you flashed seemed like the way it makes you walk back to base
Yeah, my client has been really weird lately, i would go in game and there would be no champion

Glad I'm not only person having client issues, one game loading screen was black, now when I entered game my fps was 1 and i was attempting to reconnect at very start of game now black loading screen  not letting me get back on. This is ridiculous, already put into low priority que

Yeh this happened to me too but it was only in a bot game for me :P, also theres another bug where if you DC and someone clears jungle then you reconnnect it will say on your minimap that the camp is there and it isn't. 

Maybe riot are just trolling people who DC {{summoner:31}}
